title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.14 - Criminal convictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.14 - Criminal convictions

State Regulations

Any applicant or qualifier convicted of any felony or
misdemeanor may be denied licensure or subjected to license revocation and
suspension. Departmental discretion shall be exercised pursuant to the
standards articulated in article 23-A of the Correction Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
195.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
